title: Freezing in Game Load Up and Unable to Connect?
body:
Ever since the last update, my load in screen keeps freezing and with my last ARAM, it said I was "unable to reconnect". I've checked my internet connection several times and it's been absolutely fine. Also, when I finally got back into the game (I had to launch the old client), my game completely froze in the middle of a team fight. 

Is it the new update that's causing these issues or what?
Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: I have continued playing on the old client any everything seems to be working again. Seems like the new client is having problems with the new update.

bump. 

I have switched over to the old client, dealing with a 10 min. AFK penalty atm.

Thanks RainsEclipse, I got into a game no problem.
I'm having the same problem. When I load the new client it suddenly pops up a message saying that unable to connect due to internet but my net is fine.

How can we tag Riot? 
This sucks, due to this issue I have four games left with LeaverBuster at 10 mins a piece. 
Forty minutes of waiting. I scheduled my day to do some Ranked on the first day of the season. I am so disappointed right now. 
yours truly
- TRIGGERED

When your game freezes, is it completely still or does it say attempting to reconnect?  Do you have Windows 10?  A recent update has been causing similair issues with freezing as a result of the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) game auto-enabling.  Disable that as a first step to clear the freezing issues.

I then suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up any issues blocking your connection to the game server and restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I've had it go completely still (I had to restart the whole client to get it to work again) and I've also had "Attempting to Reconnect" on the last game I played. 
I do not have Windows 10, I have Windows 7 Professional. 

Thank you, I'll check it out. =)

Update: It was fine for a couple of games until I got d/ced with no ping jumps. Animation was super laggy afterwards even after a league restart. 

I'm going to run the LoL repair on the league application and see if that fixes the problem. =\
